about.title: About Fatima Ali Health Foundation
about.vision_text: To bring hope, health, and dignity to underprivileged families, ensuring access to care and compassion for those who need it most.
about.mission_text: Founded by Dr. Muhammad Maqsood, the Fatima Ali Health Foundation has been dedicated to serving humanity since 2003. We organize free medical camps, provide essential healthcare services, and extend relief to flood victims by offering food, medicine, and support. Our mission is to bring hope, health, and dignity to underprivileged families, ensuring access to care and compassion for those who need it most.
